programme.title: Legends Of Venom
programme.desc: Vipers are one of the most feared snake families in the world. Now their stories reveal just how troubled life can be for hated snakes. Rattlesnakes in the desert cheat death by predators and people. Puffadders clean up vermin, yet face persecution. And gaboon vipers on the forest floor dare not move. This is an intimate look at their challenges and how they overcome each with unique superpowers.

programme.title: Snake City: Snakes In The City Venomous Face-Off Compilation
programme.desc: Simon, Sioux, and Mbali split up because the calls keep coming in. Sioux and Mbali face a feisty mamba on their own, while Simon catches a second black mamba solo. Then, Simon teaches Mbali how to bag her first spitting cobra while Sioux focuses on an elusive boomslang. Finally, Simon rescues a huge snake hidden in a shed while Mbali and Sioux contain a feisty, cornered black mamba.

programme.title: Secret Life Of Predators
programme.desc: Our rivers and oceans are ruthless battlefields, constantly testing the bravery of even the biggest and deadliest carnivores. Regardless of temperature, depth or terrain, every marine habitat calls for unique body designs, exquisitely evolved senses, and outrageously complex - or bizarre - tactics for success.

programme.title: Legends Of Venom
programme.desc: Black mambas are one of the most feared snakes on the planet. But behind the twitchy demeanour and lightning-fast strike is a shy and highly intelligent creature, just trying to get through the hot, snakey summer alive. This legendary serpent has a plethora of assets - venom, agility, speed and sensory superpowers - that make it a master its habitat, despite being the most hated serpent in Africa.

programme.title: Snake City: Snakes In The City Venomous Face-Off Compilation
programme.desc: A dangerous heatwave surges across India, which means more deadly snakes are on the move looking for shelter. Simon and Sioux join Snake Shyam and Gowri Shanker to battle the heat and rescue hiding snakes. The team tries to rescue a spectacled cobra from a water pit and a deadly Russell‚Äôs viper hiding in a bookstore. For the first time in 30 years, Simon tails and rescues a king cobra by himself!.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: In the Highlands, Charlotte and Petal go in search of new territory and potential mates.Over in the Flatlands, Buttercup and her siblings must figure out how to survive without parental supervision.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: For the Prairie Dogs in northern New Mexico, winter has nearly come. In the Highlands, Carl and the pups prepare for hibernation, but an unlikely alliance of deadly predators creates a heightened threat for every dog in the territory.

programme.title: Killer Snakes
programme.desc: Packed with a potent neurotoxic venom, one family of snakes kill more people than any other on earth. These are the elapids ‚Äì a family that includes the the black mamba, the king cobra, the inland taipan, and the krait. Their venom is one of the most toxic substances on earth; but in a strange twist of fate, it can also save lives.

programme.title: Africa's Deadliest: Unlikely Killers Compilation
programme.desc: Africa has its notorious killers, but other unlikely animals are rewriting the rules of the predator playbook. The mantis shrimp packs a punch with a force of a .22 caliber bullet, secretary birds take down threats with lethal legs, and the honey badger bullies off on a pack of wild dogs. Some of the continent‚Äôs most unexpected creatures can be the deadliest.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: The staffers become the clients as they bring in their pets for the vets to treat. Dr. Pol builds a special cast for an injured calf, Dr. Lisa chases a pair of goats, and Dr. Brenda has to change her plans when a reindeers symptoms suddenly change. With a goose, bunny, and pregnant pup all at the clinic, the staff works hard keeping Pol Vet running smoothly. .

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Pol treats three bovines and one tiny rabbit before heading to the Netherlands with Diane to celebrate his 80th birthday. Just because the Docs away, it doesnt mean that the clinic slows down. A very vocal pig needs surgery to treat a hernia, a blocked cat is in pain and requires immediate relief, and a puppy is feeling the effects of eating something inedible. .

programme.title: Critter Fixers: Country Vets: Snake Compilation 2025
programme.desc: The Critter Fixer docs care for snakes of all sizes with a variety of medical mysteries. A hognose snake battles a dangerous respiratory infection, staff face their fears to treat venomous rescue snakes, and a boa constrictor struggles to get moving. A pint-sized serpent wins over clinic staff, a red-tailed boa presents a mysterious lump, and a Western hognose snake faces an emergency c-section.

programme.title: Legends Of Venom
